segments.text: You won ’ t believe who ’ s been elected to do overtime on the Baker account ! Me ! I ’ Ve already logged in 20 hours of overtime !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! Why so much ? I thought they were getting you an assistant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They were supposed to , but so far nobody ’ s turned up , and I ’ m left on my own to do the work . This is the first break I ’ Ve had all day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They ’ re really running you into the ground . Why don ’ t you ask for some time off ? You could take a long weekend and go away somewhere .
segments.speaker: S2
